summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Sixty-sixth, Street, East Sixty-seventh Street and East Sixty-ninth Street, each from Weedin Place to Tenth Avenue Northeast; East Sixty-eighth Street, from Meadow Place to Tenth Avenue Northeast; Eighth Avenue Northeast, from Weedin Place to East Seventieth Street; Tenth Avenue Northeast, from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Seventieth-fifth Street; and Oswego Place, from East Sixty-eighth Street to East Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, together with the necessary appurtenances for the proper surface drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1791 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
